original: chos mngon pa las /

analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i gnyen po bsgoms pas zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad med de zhes bya ba gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral
translated: Because he is free of the conceptual thoughts of apprehending and so on,

analyzed: du gyur pa na zag pa med pa ste /

analyzed: rtogs pa ni nges par brtags pa ste / de'i rnam pa thams can gyis chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba gzugs la sogs pa phyi'i mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis na ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
